cms_item.title: FAQs
cms_item.content: <div class="faqs-container"> <div class="faq-title google-element-font">Frequently Asked Questions</div> <div class="faq-description mb-desktop-25">This Agreement was last modified on 18th february 2022</div> <div class="row"> <div class="col-lg-6"> <div class="list-faqs list-left mb-desktop-30"> <div class="sub-title google-element-font">General Questions</div> <div class="accordion" id="accordionGeneral"> <div class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-header"> <div class="accordion-title" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#accordion-1" aria-expanded="true"> What Shipping Methods Are Available? </div> </div> <div id="accordion-1" class="collapse show" data-parent="#accordionGeneral"> <div class="accordion-content"> <p>Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium dolorema laudantium, totam anaperiam, eaque ipsa quae illo inventore veritatis quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quian an voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur.</p> </div> </div> </div> <div class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-header"> <div class="accordion-title collapsed" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#accordion-2"> How Long Should One Wait Before Painting In Case Of A New Construction? </div> </div> <div id="accordion-2" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordionGeneral"> <div class="accordion-content"> <p>Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium dolorema laudantium, totam anaperiam, eaque ipsa quae illo inventore veritatis quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quian an voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur.</p> </div> </div> </div> <div class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-header"> <div class="accordion-title collapsed" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#accordion-3"> Can Ink Or Other Stains Be Washed Off? </div> </div> <div id="accordion-3" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordionGeneral"> <div class="accordion-content"> <p>Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium dolorema laudantium, totam anaperiam, eaque ipsa quae illo inventore veritatis quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quian an voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur.</p> </div> </div> </div> <div class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-header"> <div class="accordion-title collapsed" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#accordion-4"> How Do The Stains On The Floor Be Removed After The Painting Is Over? </div> </div> <div id="accordion-4" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordionGeneral"> <div class="accordion-content"> <p>Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium dolorema laudantium, totam anaperiam, eaque ipsa quae illo inventore veritatis quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo.
